author: Jerry Widodo
comment: this was a much better app when it was partnered with spotify. I was trying to get a feel of how the app is without a subscription. But the ADS are just too much. They force 10-15 second ads on you FAR too often for me to want to give money. Not impressed.   Also, this app has a built in 'player' that sounds like utter trash. Comparing it to spotify's level of streaming and playback, this sounds gargled and excreted in comparison. Within seconds you can hear the shrill piercing treble of each song.

author: alvangee
comment: Bad interface, non-intuitive, very convoluted. Lots of not needed stuff. Your widget popping up every time it wants is so annoying. Offline lyrics is a paid option. And I was even ready to pay, right to the moment it turned out to be a monthly subscription, not a one time order. I need this app like three times a year when I feel like it to listen to some rap albums, not going to pay every month or full year up front for that. Your search is just awful. There's no easy way to find one artist, then see all his albums, then see all the songs from the albums. I'm out.

author: Rajat Joshi
comment: This app is getting pathetic and lamer by the day. Have been a loyal user of this app since day 1. From my galaxy, to my nexus and now on my oneplus. Used to love it earlier, even have a subscription. But now it just plain and simple pathetic. Random crashes, bugs and now not even able to make a lyrics card. I click on the option and nothing happens. Have a lot of things in life to be irritated from, now this app is also becoming an integral part in irritating me. I'll wait for the next update and if these  bugs and crashes are not fixed I am going to cancel my subscription and Uninstall this jet lag of a app.

author: Andrea Guaraldi
comment: Really useful app, I love it! But I cannot give more than 3 stars because most of the lyrics are out of sync.. I've seen I can send a feedback if the lyrics is worng/out of sync but they take a long time to fix it. It's gonna be probably the best music app, but they firstly need to fix this problem

author: Arijit Mahato
comment: Please provide another paid Pro app i want to paid your hard work. But i hate subscription base application ... So please bring a one time purchase app. Other wise I'll stick with the free one .

author: Eric Ortego
comment: There were ads popping up before I could even try the app out. It did identify the first song correctly but then provided me with lyrics to a whole other song Shame

author: Beatriz Choi
comment: First of all, I just use this app to fix some song tags, since I download online. And no I don't share or sell them so I don't pirate. I'm just a broke high school student. But as time flies, I started to dislike the app. From "What a nice app" turns to "What a crappy app for singing with lyrics". I'd rather go to an online site thay provides well organized lyrics with romanized, translated or just the lyrics, play music on my usual music player. Done

author: Trish Walther
comment: Having too many ads is one thing but apps that want to be installed that jump up and have to be closed out with a manual touch of the finger isn't worth my time. Annoying is an understatement. If there was negative number that is what I would give it. So for me even with a year of the subscription left I am removing the app that takes spam to a whole new annoying level.

author: Emily Luna
comment: Listening to Spotify, app identifies songs, loads lyrics. When I open the lyrics, for a split second they're in sync and then the app kicks the lyrics back up to the beginning of the song and it never syncs up again. It will start scrolling through from the beginning no matter where in the song I am. So irritating. I don't want the floating lyrics on all the time but I like being able to open lyrics mid-song.  I can't do that anymore. It's stupid because when I open the app, it's in the right place but "loading" the lyrics when they're opened screws everything up.  Paid version. Waste of money.

author: w i r a r a s
comment: All was good buat sometimes the lyrics not at the same time with music but its okey because we can fix it  i think you have to make a theme of a colour and its can be very nice  btw good job!!! Well done     for 2017 you gus make a nice style i luv it good job again

author: fakhrun affandi
comment: When i played song cover in Soundcloud, the floating lyrics error. It's need to identify lyirics in musixmatch app.
You guys have intentionally made the app as slow as a turtle. It used to be one of my favourite apps, but it's getting worse after every update. Will look for something else, now.
App was better when it was free and there were less advt.. Now with every click you you see some irritating pop-up. Moving to different music player.

author: youbetter watchout
comment: Rubbish. It has the tool to identify song but is unable to identify a complete song. It asked to complete the file info whatsoever and when I did, it still gave me nothing and in the end it said 'couldn't find the lyrics...you didn't really want to listen to it, do you?' What kind of joke is this? People downloaded this app SO they can get the lyrics and here your oh-so-smart app trying to tell us that we DON'T want to get the lyrics? Heh? Good job. Uninstall right after sending this review. Thanks.

author: nagesh yadav
comment: Worest app  There are too many ads irritating Please don't Install this app Time waste  Premium membership there It's not good for lyrics  Try other app

author: Michael Soza
comment: Since the UI changes a lot of stuff are with bugs. First rotate screen produce current lyric lost, the message 'oops blabla appears'.  Second the syncing gets completely wrong when you turn off/on screen. It is a real pain that is always scrolling to a wrong place. If that is so bad implemented the option to disable it should be present.

author: MAHAAN MAHESH N
comment: Floating lyrics not working, floating lyrics working only on youtube.fix it. Upgraded to premium,even though floating lyrics not working,it seems you people are not bothered about user complaint. You should fix it

author: lewis mac
comment: I'm a long time user of this app and think it's wonderful but your recent changes mean that it now doesn't automatically scroll through the lyrics therefore rendering this app useless. I am very displeased

author: Srishti Verma
comment: Everything if fine but whenever I edit any downloaded song's info, an error occurs while playing that song and I can't even play that song on other apps also. Please help.
Floating lyric didn't sync? Even popular song? What's the point then? It's getting worse

author: Meet Gandhi
comment: Can't make playlist, shows wrong lyrics, crashes. Used to love it but will have to search for something else now.

author: Yohanes Putra
comment: STILL BUGSY PLEASE SERIOUSLY FIX IT. I CAN'T SIGN IN. THIS APP USELESS AFTER UPDATING

author: Heni Elloumi
comment: I hated 'cause it have a lot of ads and the offline lyrics has been changed for premium 😥😞 and I don't have a card or money to buy it

author: soubhagya mohapatra
comment: Overall app is good but my phone lags a lot it suddenly locks and then unlocks also it shows an add for playing a song each time. So I am giving it 2 stars for this time...

author: pavithra chandrasekar
comment: What have you done with the new update? Every 5mins even when i'm listening to songs it asks login or sign in.. this have been my favorite app ever and I'm using it on a regular basis but this annoys me a lot so i have to uninstall it.. hope u'll fix it soon then I'll come back...

author: First Last
comment: Okay. The lyrics work well and help me a ton when I can't understand what the singer is saying. Thanks for that. And the auto tag feature works well. However, the notifications are irritating, and the pop up lyrics are also annoying. The little button should appear instead of the lyrics appearing by default when a song is detected. The lyrics sometimes sync with what your are listening to, sometimes it just displays the lyrcis in a list as if it didn't know the timing although it did last the previous time on the same song. It's also nagging when it asks you about your feelings about a song. I don't mind the little upgrade button, but this message covers a significant portion of the lyrics and is just there as a form of psychological punishment for being stingy and not buying the subscription, I'm convinced.

author: sorush 27
comment: Hallo i have a question if its possible please make a task bar to send some request for language translation becuse some sont dont have translat or at all not compelet or thats have a falsh meaning specially for persian language  thank you

author: honey saxena
comment: I hate this application though was using musixmatch from last 2 years. I mean developers are doing nothing to resolve the issues and bugs. What is the point of updating the app if the problem still persists. Dissatisfied and Disappointed.

author: TheBottomLine U.K
comment: App is good, but Punjabi language is indicated with Pakistani flag while Script is Indian, please show Punjabi as Indian Language, it is written in India not Pakistan!

author: Caroline Moura
comment: Don't understand why I can't edit info of some audios, it shows an error saying the file is malformed but it plays fine

author: Dosumarushi
comment: It won't let you see the full lyrics anymore. If a song is synced up it'll just show the lyric it on and won't let you see the full song. It's frustrating especially when I just want to read the lyrics.

author: Wahyu Doank
comment: The lyric its depend on your internet = BAD If you play music japanese, and you want to play romanji is very BAD SO MANY advertisement in here = very bad

author: Jay D Boss
comment: Mi4i couldn't ser the floating window even after turn on the pop up permission

author: Mark Everest
comment: I pay for this app to remove the ads, but for the latest version I am asked for every song to help. Annoying! If I answer "Not now", stop asking me!

author: Sigha Samson
comment: Apps good but no floating lyrics outside the app and I don't like it

author: Tushar Singh
comment: The equaliser has stopped since since the last update. Please fix it.
Consumes way too much data, which is incompatible with the task it performs (downloading a few dozen lines of text every 2 mins)

author: AhLel WasahLel
comment: Annoyed with the new updates. Everytime my screen turn off, this player will also stop and close by itself. Never experienced before this

author: Akshay Deshmukh
comment: App needs an update. Music player doesn't appear when I open the app. It appears only after restarting the app multiple times

author: Haterforreal
comment: I like the app a lot; there is lyrics in many languages. The only thing is it doesn't easily identify a song.
